topic.fullpath: Topic :: Scientific/Engineering :: Artificial Intelligence :: Intelligent Agents

name: P3: The Portable Unix Programming System

screenshots.caption: psrp in asychronous communication with a client process

short_description: PUPS/P3 facilitates development of multi-process multi-host computations by providing tools to emulate colonies of homeostatic organisms. It permits persistent computation, homeostatic resource protection, and asychronous interprocess communication.
